item.description:
Hi All,

This is a 20 miler and/or half marathon just over 3 weeks before the Boston Marathon... perfect as a last long training run or as an appertizer for the delights of the 2010 racing season.

Registration and details are on here - http://www.easternsta...

Please check off yes on here too once you're registered!

Take care... Martin

p.s. you're responsible for your own fees, safety etc. etc. etc.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: (Race) - Eastern States 20 miler and/or Run to The Border half marathon
